content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I am a shrewd landlord, so let's focus on the rental price. What is the price you are considering for this apartment? Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. Considering the condition of the apartment and its location, I think a price of 500 Euros per month is appropriate.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but as a greedy landlord, I am looking for more. Please make another proposal. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. Considering the condition of the apartment and its location, I think a price of 450 Euros per month is more appropriate.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I respect your counteroffer, but I am still seeking more for this apartment. Please make another proposal. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, considering the condition of the apartment and its location, I think a price of 400 Euros per month is the best I can do.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your persistence, but as a greedy landlord, I am still seeking more. Please make another proposal. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I have already provided several counteroffers and the landlord has not shown any willingness to meet me in the middle.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand, and I respect your decision to end the negotiation. Let's terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
